content.rendered:
Ansley and Zach's southern summer wedding took place on The Bridge Building's rooftop with the downtown skyline as their backdrop.

With a mix of navy blue linens, natural wood elements and touches of pale pink, the overall design was equal parts masculine and feminine.

To start, a gorgeous custom crafted, wooden cross with floral accents by Forget Me Not Designs created the perfect atmosphere for their heartfelt ceremony on the rooftop.

Following, guests snacked on candied bacon, pepper jelly pimento cheese bruschetta, and tequila-infused watermelon before sitting down to dinner.

They enjoyed a perfectly southern meal with entrees including BBQ pulled pork biscuit sliders, buttermilk fried chicken and four-cheese macaroni.

Scroll on for more from this southern summer wedding captured by Nyk + Cali.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: August 27, 2016
Bride & Groom: Ansley and Zach
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 137
Colors: Navy, White & Blush
Photographer: Nyk + Cali
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Cake: Nashville Sweets
DJ: DJ Rich
Draping: Nashville Audio Visual
Catering: The Bridge Building
Lighting & Sound: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Lesa | IH

excerpt.rendered: A sweet and southern summer wedding at The Bridge Building.
